title: I got a warning, and was put into a low priority queue because of your client crashes.
body:
Riot, 

Why was I put into a low priority queue because of problems on your end? I was doing my last 3 promo games, but because of your client which caused me to crash all 3 times after champ select (and despite having a reconnect button - it wouldn't reconnect me after pressing it numerous times) I am now being punished. 

So now in addition to having "left" my final 3 promo games, I  am now being punished and put into low priority queue for 5 matchmade games?

What????

replies.body:
There aren't any issues going on from our end that I was able to find. Most of these issues are caused by an *unstable connection* to the servers, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are good.

Let me know if you still experience these issues after taking those steps.

I just went ahead and redownloaded the client, and I won't be using the new client until it's mandatory. For some reason the new client kept reverting back to an older version, which resulted in numerous bug splats.
